Option(name='win_size', help='set the window size', type='AV_OPT_TYPE_INT', default=2048, choices=[])

Option(name='win_func', help='set window function', type='AV_OPT_TYPE_INT', default='WFUNC_HANNING', choices=[Choice(name='rect', help='Rectangular', value='WFUNC_RECT'), Choice(name='bartlett', help='Bartlett', value='WFUNC_BARTLETT'), Choice(name='hann', help='Hann', value='WFUNC_HANNING'), Choice(name='hanning', help='Hanning', value='WFUNC_HANNING'), Choice(name='hamming', help='Hamming', value='WFUNC_HAMMING'), Choice(name='blackman', help='Blackman', value='WFUNC_BLACKMAN'), Choice(name='welch', help='Welch', value='WFUNC_WELCH'), Choice(name='flattop', help='Flat-top', value='WFUNC_FLATTOP'), Choice(name='bharris', help='Blackman-Harris', value='WFUNC_BHARRIS'), Choice(name='bnuttall', help='Blackman-Nuttall', value='WFUNC_BNUTTALL'), Choice(name='bhann', help='Bartlett-Hann', value='WFUNC_BHANN'), Choice(name='sine', help='Sine', value='WFUNC_SINE'), Choice(name='nuttall', help='Nuttall', value='WFUNC_NUTTALL'), Choice(name='lanczos', help='Lanczos', value='WFUNC_LANCZOS'), Choice(name='gauss', help='Gauss', value='WFUNC_GAUSS'), Choice(name='tukey', help='Tukey', value='WFUNC_TUKEY'), Choice(name='dolph', help='Dolph-Chebyshev', value='WFUNC_DOLPH'), Choice(name='cauchy', help='Cauchy', value='WFUNC_CAUCHY'), Choice(name='parzen', help='Parzen', value='WFUNC_PARZEN'), Choice(name='poisson', help='Poisson', value='WFUNC_POISSON'), Choice(name='bohman', help='Bohman', value='WFUNC_BOHMAN'), Choice(name='kaiser', help='Kaiser', value='WFUNC_KAISER')])
Option(name='overlap', help='set window overlap', type='AV_OPT_TYPE_FLOAT', default=0.5, choices=[])

Option(name='measure', help='select the parameters which are measured', type='AV_OPT_TYPE_FLAGS', default='MEASURE_ALL', choices=[Choice(name='none', help='', value='MEASURE_NONE'), Choice(name='all', help='', value='MEASURE_ALL'), Choice(name='mean', help='', value='MEASURE_MEAN'), Choice(name='variance', help='', value='MEASURE_VARIANCE'), Choice(name='centroid', help='', value='MEASURE_CENTROID'), Choice(name='spread', help='', value='MEASURE_SPREAD'), Choice(name='skewness', help='', value='MEASURE_SKEWNESS'), Choice(name='kurtosis', help='', value='MEASURE_KURTOSIS'), Choice(name='entropy', help='', value='MEASURE_ENTROPY'), Choice(name='flatness', help='', value='MEASURE_FLATNESS'), Choice(name='crest', help='', value='MEASURE_CREST'), Choice(name='flux', help='', value='MEASURE_FLUX'), Choice(name='slope', help='', value='MEASURE_SLOPE'), Choice(name='decrease', help='', value='MEASURE_DECREASE'), Choice(name='rolloff', help='', value='MEASURE_ROLLOFF')])
